byline.original: By KATHERINE SCHULTEN and SHANNON DOYNE

abstract: Ideas for using the British Museum's "The History of the World in 100 Objects," along with a related Times article and slide show, in the classroom.
snippet: Ideas for using the British Museum's "The History of the World in 100 Objects," along with a related Times article and slide show, in the classroom.
lead_paragraph: In "Stuff That Defines Us," Carol Vogel writes:

headline.main: Whether Humble or Glorious: Telling Stories of Human History Through Objects
